author: CMSTrackerDPG
body:
#### PR description:

This PR enabled from 2025 onward the SiPixel good edge algorithm introduced in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48356.

#### PR validation:

None

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

To be backported to CMSSW_15_0_X
title: Enabling SiPixel good edge algorithm from 2025 onward
